# SofaType

**Enumeration**

Types of sofa the framework identifies in a captured room.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SofaType
```

## Overview

When the framework observes a sofa in the physical environment during a scan, it chooses a type among these options that best matches the sofa’s look. The framework adds that instance of this enum to the [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Object/attributes] array for the object (see [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/objects]) that represents the sofa in the captured room.

## Choosing a sofa type

- **SofaType.rectangular**: A sofa shape that resembles a rectangle.
- **SofaType.singleSeat**: A sofa that resembles a loveseat.
- **SofaType.lShaped**: A sofa shape that resembles the letter L.
- **SofaType.lShapedExtension**: The short side of the L-shape sofa.
- **SofaType.unidentified**: An uncategorized sofa shape.

## Conforms To

- CapturedRoomAttribute
- CaseIterable
- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
